function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of widespread population testing for COVID-19","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of the true number of cases and potential spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Increase availability of widespread population testing and contact tracing","Technologies":"Data analytics for predictive modeling, digital contact tracing","People":"General population, healthcare workers, policy makers","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Fragmented data sources and solutions for COVID-19","Impact":"Inefficiency and inaccuracy in understanding the pandemic and developing effective solutions","Mitigation":"Develop a holistic framework for integrating data sources and digital solutions","Technologies":"Data analytics, integration of digital solutions, artificial intelligence","People":"Policy makers, data analysts, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Limited amount of data for forecasting new COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Inability to accurately predict and prepare for new outbreaks, leading to potential uncontrolled spread","Mitigation":"Develop hybrid approaches for real-time forecasting and increase data collection efforts","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling, AI-based forecasting","People":"Policy makers, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
